job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* DiscoverCustomersPartners
     * Databricks PlatformIntegrations and DataPricingOpen Source
     * Databricks for IndustriesCross Industry SolutionsMigration & DeploymentSolution Accelerators
     * Training and CertificationEventsBlog and PodcastsGet HelpDive Deep
     * CompanyCareersPressSecurity and Trust
     * Ready to get started?
       Pre-sales Solutions Engineer (Data Engineer or Data Science/ML, Cloud)

   Amsterdam, Netherlands

   Req ID FEQ325R52

   At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   You will be reporting to the Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.

Pre-sales Solutions Engineer (Data Engineer

     * Ready to get started?
       Pre-sales Solutions Engineer (Data Engineer or Data Science/ML, Cloud)

   Amsterdam, Netherlands

   Req ID FEQ325R52

   At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   You will be reporting to the Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on pre-sales activities, customer relationship building, and demonstrating a platform's capabilities. While it mentions data engineering, data science, and ML, it does not detail the core responsibilities of building, training, or deploying models or generative AI systems. The emphasis is on advising on architecture and design, authoring reference architectures, and hands-on evaluation with Spark programming, which aligns more with a pre-sales technical advisor role rather than a dedicated ML or GenAI Engineer. The role is primarily about selling a platform's capabilities rather than developing AI solutions from scratch.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves forming relationships with clients, understanding their technical and business value, and demonstrating how the platform can solve complex data challenges to help businesses move forward. This aligns with understanding business context and translating technical solutions to business value.
The role requires guiding customers to achieve their goals and move their businesses forward, indicating a need to understand business objectives.
The job title explicitly mentions 'Data Engineer' and the description refers to 'Databricks Data Intelligence Platform' and 'Big Data Analytics', implying work with data infrastructure and pipelines.
The role involves advising on aspects of architecture and design for Big Data Analytics, which is a key part of data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design

job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions 'Data Science/ML' in the title and 'Spark programming' which can be used for model training and evaluation, although the focus is on demonstration rather than core model development.
The role involves hands-on evaluation using Spark programming, which is often used in the context of data science and machine learning model development and testing.

The role involves integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications, and authoring demo applications, which requires software development skills for integration and demonstration purposes.
job_tasks.phrase: integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications

job_tasks.justification: The role requires authoring demo applications, which involves software development to showcase platform capabilities.
job_tasks.phrase: authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Databricks Data Intelligence Platform' and 'integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem' suggests an understanding of how data solutions are deployed and integrated, though MLOps is not explicitly detailed.
job_tasks.phrase: integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem

soft_skills.phrase: collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect
Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect
